duties_responsibilities.duty: Providing project management, design engineering, analysis, cost estimates, and permitting for the construction of distribution facilities to ensure safe and reliable power delivery
Working on large, technically complex projects and participating in cross-functional project teams
Ensuring design compliance with all applicable requirements, codes, standards, and policies
Accountability for safety, reliability, operability, and economy of assigned projects
Providing technical direction and training to engineers, designers, and others
Acting as a technical expert in specific areas of expertise
Staying abreast of technological advances and providing recommendations in response to emerging trends
Focus on continuous improvement and development of job-related engineering knowledge and skills

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering from an ABET-accredited program
Professional Engineer (PE) license or means for reciprocity within six months
